sentence.Network_en: I think I can take most medicine except for strong pain reliever.
sentence.Network_cn: 除了止痛片以外大多数药我都可以服用.

sentence.Network_en: Other medicines are also available - include long - acting reliever and preventer tablets.
sentence.Network_cn: 还有一些其他的 长效 的缓解类和预防类药物的片剂.

sentence.Network_en: Crying can be a great stress reliever.
sentence.Network_cn: 哭是一种很好的减压方式.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who takes the place of another (as when things get dangerous or difficult);

sentences.sentence: "the star had a stand-in for dangerous scenes"
"we need extra employees for summer fill-ins"

means.word_mean: 2. a person who reduces the intensity (e.g., of fears) and calms and pacifies;
3. a pitcher who does not start the game
